# usRds

This is a prototype of an R package to facilitate analysis of the United
States Renal Data System using R, “usRds”. The package assumes that the
user already has obtained the data from the USRDS system, and that all
files are in CSV, SAS, or parquet format.

To install the package, type the following into R:

‘devtools::install_github(“VagishHemmige/usRds”)’

You will need to use the **set_USRDS_wd()** function to establish the
directory where the USRDS files are stored:

``` r
library(usRds)

# Session only:
set_USRDS_wd("C:/Path/To/USRDS")

# Or set permanently:
set_USRDS_wd("C:/Path/To/USRDS", permanent = TRUE)
```

The following functions are used to extract claims and diagnosis data
from the USRDS files:

- **[`get_IN_HCPCS()`](https://vagishhemmige.github.io/usRds/reference/get_IN_HCPCS.md)**
  — Extract inpatient claims with specified HCPCS codes  
- **[`get_IN_ICD()`](https://vagishhemmige.github.io/usRds/reference/get_IN_ICD.md)**
  — Extract inpatient claims with specified ICD diagnosis codes  
- **[`get_PS_ICD()`](https://vagishhemmige.github.io/usRds/reference/get_PS_ICD.md)**
  — Extract Physician Supplier claims by ICD codes  
- **[`get_PS_HCPCS()`](https://vagishhemmige.github.io/usRds/reference/get_PS_HCPCS.md)**
  — Extract Physician Supplier claims by HCPCS codes

Each function searches across all supported file formats (`.csv`,
`.sas7bdat`, `.parquet`) and filters efficiently by year and code list.

See [Function
Reference](https://vagishhemmige.github.io/usRds/reference/index.md) for
full documentation.

Much more, including help files, vignettes, etc. will be coming soon!

## Installation

You can install the development version of usRds from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("VagishHemmige/usRds")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

``` r
library(usRds)
## basic example code
```

# Package index

## All functions

- [`apply_srtr_varlabels()`](https://vagishhemmige.github.io/usRds/reference/apply_srtr_varlabels.md)
  : Apply SRTR variable labels to a data frame
- [`apply_usrds_factors()`](https://vagishhemmige.github.io/usRds/reference/apply_usrds_factors.md)
  : Apply USRDS factor labels to a data frame
- [`apply_usrds_varlabels()`](https://vagishhemmige.github.io/usRds/reference/apply_usrds_varlabels.md)
  : Apply USRDS variable labels to a data frame
- [`convert_usrds_to_parquet()`](https://vagishhemmige.github.io/usRds/reference/convert_usrds_to_parquet.md)
  : Convert all USRDS raw files in a directory to Parquet
- [`get_IN_HCPCS()`](https://vagishhemmige.github.io/usRds/reference/get_IN_HCPCS.md)
  : Retrieve Institutional HCPCS Claims
- [`get_IN_ICD()`](https://vagishhemmige.github.io/usRds/reference/get_IN_ICD.md)
  : Retrieve diagnosis codes from Institutional claims
- [`get_PS_HCPCS()`](https://vagishhemmige.github.io/usRds/reference/get_PS_HCPCS.md)
  : Retrieve HCPCS codes from Physician/Supplier claims
- [`get_PS_ICD()`](https://vagishhemmige.github.io/usRds/reference/get_PS_ICD.md)
  : Retrieve diagnosis claims from Physician/Supplier files by ICD code
- [`get_PS_specialty()`](https://vagishhemmige.github.io/usRds/reference/get_PS_specialty.md)
  : Extract PS specialty claims
- [`load_usrds_file()`](https://vagishhemmige.github.io/usRds/reference/load_usrds_file.md)
  : Load a USRDS file and optionally apply labels
- [`set_USRDS_wd()`](https://vagishhemmige.github.io/usRds/reference/set_USRDS_wd.md)
  : Set the USRDS working directory
